entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
